lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Excuse me, Professor… Do you have a moment?

lines.speaker: Professor
lines.text: If this is about your grades — they’re not finalized yet.

lines.speaker: Professor
lines.text: But if you’re here about the Finals Project, then you’re only slightly late.

lines.speaker: Professor
lines.text: It’s mandatory. Everyone must submit one. No project, no pass.

options.text: When do I need to bring it?
